writer.name: 沃尔夫冈·阿玛多伊斯·莫扎特 Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

director.name: 戴维·麦维卡尔 David McVicar

this_title: Royal Opera House Live Cinema Season 2015
introduction: Figaro and Susanna plan to get married - but their master Count Almaviva has designs on Susanna and is determined to stop the wedding taking place. Meanwhile the page Cherubino's passion for the ladies jeopardizes his job, and Countess Almaviva longs to regain her husband's love.Figaro, Susanna and the Countess plot to shame the Count and save Cherubino from banishment. But th...
